calls.label: A1: Monolith (tout-en-un)

prompt.content: You are a senior social media strategist and copywriter.

Brand: Premium Home Renovations
Voice: Confident, warm, trustworthy. Luxury feel but approachable.
Platform: X (Twitter) â€” max 280 chars for main post.
CTA: "Book your free consultation today"
Include: 2-3 best customer quotes, relevant hashtags, alt-text for image.
Also produce: 2 variant posts + an image generation prompt.
Target audience: Homeowners aged 30-55 considering renovation.

Here are 30 Google Reviews from our customers:
  Review #1: "Absolutely amazing experience! The team went above and beyond to help us. Our kitchen renovation looks like it came straight out of a magazine. Would recommend to anyone!"
  Review #2: "Good work overall. Finished on time but communication could have been better during the project."
  Review #3: "5 stars! They transformed our bathroom completely. The tile work is flawless and the attention to detail is incredible."
  Review #4: "Decent service. The price was fair but nothing exceptional about the final result."
  Review #5: "I cannot say enough good things about this company. From the initial consultation to the final walkthrough, everything was professional and top-notch. The custom cabinetry they built is a work of art."
  Review #6: "Average experience. They did what was asked but didn't go the extra mile."
  Review #7: "Wow! Our living room remodel exceeded all expectations. The designer really understood our vision and the craftsmen executed it perfectly. Best investment we've made in our home."
  Review #8: "The project took longer than initially quoted. Quality was fine but the delays were frustrating."
  Review #9: "Outstanding! They handled our full home renovation with incredible skill. Every room looks stunning. The project manager kept us informed every step of the way."
  Review #10: "It was okay. Some minor issues with the paint job that needed touch-ups."
  Review #11: "Life-changing renovation! Our outdated 1970s kitchen is now a modern chef's paradise. The quartz countertops and custom island are absolutely gorgeous. Worth every penny!"
  Review #12: "Satisfactory work. Met the basic requirements of the contract."
  Review #13: "Exceptional craftsmanship! The hardwood flooring they installed is beautiful. They even helped us pick the perfect stain color. Very knowledgeable team."
  Review #14: "Had some scheduling issues but the end result was acceptable."
  Review #15: "Best home improvement company in the area! They rebuilt our deck and it's absolutely stunning. Used premium materials and the finish is impeccable. Our neighbors are jealous!"
  Review #16: "Fine work. Nothing to complain about but nothing extraordinary either."
  Review #17: "These guys are artists! The custom built-in shelving they created for our library is museum-quality. Every joint is perfect. They truly care about their craft."
  Review #18: "Project went over budget by about 10%. The quality was good but the cost management could improve."
  Review #19: "A dream come true! Our master suite renovation is like staying in a luxury hotel every night. The walk-in shower with the rainfall head was the best decision ever. Thank you!"
  Review #20: "Standard renovation work. Got the job done within a reasonable timeframe."
  Review #21: "Incredible attention to detail! They noticed things we would have missed. The crown molding and trim work throughout our home is absolutely flawless. True professionals."
  Review #22: "Mixed feelings. Some aspects were great, others were just average. The kitchen looks good but the bathroom could have been better."
  Review #23: "Beyond impressed! The outdoor living space they created is perfect for entertaining. The stone patio, built-in grill, and pergola look like they belong in a luxury resort."
  Review #24: "Reasonable prices and decent quality. Would consider using them again for smaller projects."
  Review #25: "Absolutely phenomenal! Our basement transformation from a dingy storage space to a beautiful family room with home theater is unbelievable. The soundproofing they did is incredible!"
  Review #26: "They showed up on time and did clean work. Nothing fancy but reliable."
  Review #27: "I'm blown away by the quality! The French doors they installed open up our dining room beautifully. The trim work matches our 1920s home perfectly. They respected the character of our house."
  Review #28: "Good but not great. The materials used were quality but some of the finishing work was rushed."
  Review #29: "Cannot recommend highly enough! They saved our flood-damaged home and made it even better than before. The insurance process was stressful but they handled everything with grace and expertise."
  Review #30: "Completed the project as described. Fair pricing and professional conduct throughout."

Please produce ALL of the following in a single response:
1. Pick the 2-3 best review quotes (most compelling, specific, emotional).
2. Write a main X (Twitter) post (max 280 chars) incorporating a quote snippet.
3. Write 2 variant posts (different angles, also max 280 chars each).
4. Suggest 3-5 relevant hashtags.
5. Write alt-text for a promotional image.
6. Write a detailed image generation prompt (style, composition, mood, colors).

Format your response clearly with labeled sections.

calls.response:
- *Perfect.*

4.  **Hashtags (3-5 relevant):**
    *   #HomeRenovation
    *   #LuxuryLiving
    *

prompt.content: You are a review analyst. Score the review and extract the best quote.

calls.response:
```json
{
  "top_quotes": [
    "I cannot say enough good things about this company. From the initial consultation to the final walkthrough, everything was professional and top-notch. The custom cabinetry they built is a work of art.",
    "Absolutely amazing experience! The team went above and beyond to help us. Our kitchen renovation looks like it came straight out of a magazine. Would recommend to anyone!",
    "Outstanding! They handled our full home renovation with incredible skill. Every room looks stunning. The project manager kept us informed every step of the way."
  ],
  "angles": [
    "Focus on 'Magazine-Worthy' Transformations: Leverage quotes mentioning results that look 'straight out of a magazine' (Kitchen) and 'work of art' (Custom Cabinetry) to emphasize aspirational design quality.",
    "Highlight End-to-End Professionalism & Communication: Use the review mentioning the 'initial consultation to the final walkthrough' and the 'project manager kept us informed' to market reliability and transparent project management.",
    "Showcase Comprehensive Capability (From Single Room to Full Home): Pair the specific kitchen/cabinetry praise with the 'full home renovation' quote to position the company as capable of handling projects of any scale."
  ]
}
```

"Our kitchen looks like it came straight out of a magazine. Would recommend to anyone!" âœ¨

At Premium Ho

Include: style (photorealistic), composition, lighting, mood, color palette, and negative prompts.

calls.response: **Prompt:** A photorealistic, ultra-high-definition interior photograph capturing the stunning reveal of a newly renovated, magazine-worthy luxury kitchen. The composition should feature a wide-angle perspective showcasing a massive, seamless white quartz island with waterfall edges, perfectly centered under a trio of modern, sculptural brass pendant lights that cast a warm, focused glow. In the background, custom, deep navy blue shaker cabinetry contrasts elegantly with matte black appliance handles and polished chrome fixtures. The flooring is wide-plank, light-oak engineered wood, reflecting the natural light flooding in from large, strategically placed windows dressed with sheer linen curtains. The mood is aspirational, sophisticated, and immaculately clean. The color palette is dominated by crisp whites, deep navy blues, warm brass accents, and natural wood tones. **Negative Prompts:** cartoon, illustration, blurry, low-resolution, messy, cluttered, visible people, outdated appliances, excessive clutter, poor lighting.
